name: Creepyface's Maze 2.0
description:
Well This Is A Fangame Of Creepyface's Maze! I Made This For Adding New Characters And New Stuffs! This Game It's May Not Better Than The Real Creepyface's Maze Game Because Theres Some Things Not In The Game But The Name Of The Game Is Creepyface's Maze 2.0 Because I Added New Characters And Stuffs!

Story: John Decided To Go Back In The Maze But He Thought It Was Abandonned But It's Not... The Maze Was More Scarier And More Crazier. You Need To Steal 10 Keys To Escape The Maze And Unlock Something Amazing! We Don't Know Yet But We Will See In Chapter 2!

Credits To Agent 11 For The Original Game!

Tip: If You Are Slow Walking Or Running Diagonally Is The Best Thing To Get Faster!

Real Game In Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/creepyface/417041
